settings.title: WE WRITE EMAILS
settings.content: 15% OFF when you join the squad. Sign up to get exclusive offers and updates.

settings.title: THE NEW CLEAN
settings.content: Unwash challenges conventional wisdom and the harsh cycle of traditional shampoo, condition, repeat.

settings.subheading: A reset button for your hair
settings.title: Lifts away build up
fight flakes and rebalance your scalp
Our story
settings.content: Add your own custom content to explain your processes...

settings.title: Popup
settings.content: You can use this popup to display some useful information to your customers.

settings.title: Curls Dry Cleanser
settings.content:
No annoying white residue. 
Yes to shinier, bouncier hair. 
Yes to feeling like this is a waterless cleanser that's made just for your and your curls. 

We promise, there's nothing dry about this dry cleanser.

settings.title: in with the New Clean.
settings.content: Unwash is all about minimizing exposure to soap and locking in moisture, color, natural oils, and all the things that make hair smooth, shiny, healthy, frizz-free, and gorgeous.

settings.title: RESULTS YOU CAN SEE
settings.content: The images below are the before and after results of women who are using the Bio-Cleansing Conditioner for just one week every other day.

settings.title: Cationic Cleansers
settings.content:
Removes unwanted dirt and oil
without disrupting the cuticle.

settings.title: Hemp Seed Oil
settings.content:
Helps strengthen hair and stimulate 
growth preventing water loss to 
protect your hair.

settings.title: Hydrolyzed Keratin
settings.content:
Strengthens the hair, seals in 
moisture and nutrients to smooth 
the hair cuticle, reducing frizz and 
adding shine.

settings.title: Organic Evening Primrose Oil
settings.content:
Nourishes the hair and scalp,
increasing hydration and
shine in the hair.

settings.text: Thoroughly wet your hair to allow the product to saturate evenly. Gather a quarter-sized amount for short hair or 2 to 3x more for thicker, longer hair.
Apply the product from roots through to the ends. Massage into areas with excess build-up and oil.
Rinse thoroughly, allow hair to air dry, or begin blow-drying.
Thoroughly wet your hair to allow the product to saturate evenly. Gather a quarter-sized amount for short hair or 2 to 3x more for thicker, longer hair.

settings.question: Is this color safe?
settings.answer: Yes, and will preserve your color, too.

settings.question: Will this work on fine hair?
settings.answer: Yes, and great for all hair types.

settings.question: Can I use it with a keratin treatment?
settings.answer:
Yes, that is the beauty (no pun intended) of this unique cleansing conditioner. It is fabulous for all hair
types and treatments.

settings.question: Cruelty-free?
settings.answer:
Yes, and free of sulfate detergents and parabens that 
strip of natural oils.

settings.question: How do you get the best results?
settings.answer:
Less is more. Apply to very wet hair, scrub well, and add water during the application to ensure even spreading.
Rinse thoroughly.
